channel.title: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?
channel.description: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree? If so can someone post a tutorial?

item.title: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

you should just use regular smf forums. Sign up for a webhost drag the files in with ftp and all you have to do is pretty much enter your mysql username and pass and some other info.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?

item.title: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Changing images has nothing to do with changing php code and/or mysql database structure, both of which are required for adding modifications.

Yeah, Mopar your right there, you cant install packages to smfforfree, I spent ages trying to, had no luck.
Tbh, dont bother trying.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?

item.title: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Changing images has nothing to do with changing php code and/or mysql database structure, both of which are required for adding modifications.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?

item.title: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?
item.dc:creator: @nohope nohope
item.description:
@nohope wrote:

[quote=“Exception, post:2, topic:145101”]Smfforfree is a service for noobs who don’t know how to set up the SMF forum software. It is definably possible, why not take a look at the SMF documentation, http://docs.simplemachines.org/ or look for a modification, http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/
Good luck :)[/quote]Ok If it is possible do you know how? I didn’t find the tut their anyways.[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:145101”]I don’t believe smfforfree lets you install modifications, so the answer would be no.[/quote]I think it does because you can change starfile images.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?

item.title: Is it possible to add awards to smfforfree?
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

Smfforfree is a service for noobs who don’t know how to set up the SMF forum software. It is definably possible, why not take a look at the SMF documentation, http://docs.simplemachines.org/ or look for a modification, http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/
Good luck

Read full topic
